quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: Sorfina wants to ensure that you still possess basic motor skills. Walk over to the carpet to put her worries to rest.
The carpet is located at (33,27) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: Sorfina remains skeptical and has instructed you to grab some clothes out of a nearby dresser.
The dresser is located at (29,24) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: Sorfina wants to make sure that you can dress yourself. Open up your inventory and equip the clothes you took from the dresser.
You can equip items irregardless of your location, but you may prefer to change in the privacy of the corner at (26,23) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: To repay your debt, Sorfina has requested that you assist her niece, Tanisha.
Tanisha is located at (110,88) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: Tanisha, despite her job, is disgusted by maggots and wants you to squash them for her.
The maggots seem to be infesting near (102,88) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: Tanisha has given you some useful equipment for squashing maggots. You'd better get to work!
The maggots seem to be infesting near (102,88) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: You killed the maggots for Tanisha, so you should report back to her and see what she has to say.
Tanisha is located at (110,88) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Tutorial
Introduction
quest.text: You finished all the work that Sorfina and Tanisha had for you. They still seem happy to talk to you though.
Sorfina is located at (27,27) and Tanisha is located at (110,88) – both are in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Bully
Bully
quest.text: Hasan sounds like a nasty fellow. You need to find out more about this bully.
Asking around town would probably be fruitful...

quest.name: Bully
Finding the Weakness
quest.text: Hasan needs to be taught a lesson!
Talk to Sorfina about giving Hasan what he deserves.
Sorfina is located at (27,27) in Candor Island Indoor.

quest.name: Bully
Stinging the Heel
quest.text: It seems as though Hasan is afraid of scorpions. Perhaps this could be his downfall...
You should go talk to Kaan at (46,95) on Candor Island and tell him what you've learned.

quest.name: Bully
Surprise Scorpion
quest.text: Approach Hasan and have Kaan summon a scorpion.
Hasan is holding a hostage at (33,33) on Candor Island.

quest.name: Bully
An Unconventional Savior
quest.text: You killed the scorpion and "saved" Hasan from his childhood fear.
Talk to him and see what he has to say.

quest.name: Bully
A Changed Man
quest.text: Thankfully, Hasan seems to have changed his ways for the better.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council
quest.text: The Council of Wizards has offered an incentive to those willing to help cull Candor's unruly wildlife population.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council: Maggots
quest.text: The Council wants you to kill 10 Maggots.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council: House Maggots
quest.text: The Council wants you to kill 5 House Maggots.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council: Tame Scorpion
quest.text: The Council wants you to kill 3 Tame Scorpions.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council: Scorpion
quest.text: The Council wants you to kill 1 Scorpion.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council
quest.text: You finished killing all the monsters.
Go talk to Valon at (72,86) on Candor Island.

quest.name: Valon
By Order of the Council
quest.text: You filled your quota of monsters and completed the Council's request.
Other monsters that you kill will go towards your monster points, which Ishi will redeem at (47,97) on Candor Island.

quest.name: Magic Wand
MIT Candor: Admissions
quest.text: You met Morgan, the head of the magic school of Candor.
Magic promises to be a powerful tool – once you get around to learning it that is...

quest.name: Magic Wand
MIT Candor: The Power of the Wand
quest.text: Morgan has taught you how to use #confringo, the wand's basic attack spell.
Equip your wand and try it out!

quest.name: Magic Wand
MIT Candor: The Power of the Wand
quest.text: You've successfully cast the spell!
You should go talk to Morgan at (101,57) in Candor Island Indoor and see what else she has to teach you.

quest.name: Magic Wand
MIT Candor: The Power of the Wand
quest.text: You learned the basic wand attack spell, #confringo.

quest.name: Bug Bomb
Buggy
quest.text: Zegas needs some help. As an aspiring adventure, you should see if you can assist her.

quest.name: Bug Bomb
A what bomb?
quest.text: Zegas has lost her bug bomb inside one of her storage barrels. Find it and set it off to kill the remaining bugs.

quest.name: Bug Bomb
Bug Bomb Goes Boom
quest.text: You found the bug bomb and killed the bugs! You should tell Zegas about it.

quest.name: Bug Bomb
Buggy
quest.text: You finished helping Zegas with her bug infestation.

quest.name: Bugman
The Adventures of Action Bug
quest.text: Vincent needs you to bring him some bug legs so he can make an action figure.

quest.name: Bugman
The Adventures of Action Bug
quest.text: You got Vincent all the bug legs that he needed to make his action figure!

quest.name: Hide-n-seek
Hide and Seek
quest.text: Ayasha has recruited you in a game of Hide and Seek! Find all five of her friends hidden around Candor Island.

quest.name: Hide-n-seek
Hide and Seek
quest.text: You found all of Ayasha's friends! You should go talk to Ayasha to let her know.

quest.name: Hide-n-seek
Hide and Seek
quest.text: You finished playing Hide and Seek with Ayasha and her friends.
